data.persona: I am the king of this land.  I rule over everyone.  I make the laws.
data.description:
You are in the Chapel of the eight.
Made entirely out of gold and with precious jewels all around. Sculptures and many symbols with a red carpet goes from the entrance up until the end of the chapel.
There's a tapestry, a Sculpture, a jewel, a gold, and a red carpet here.
The maid and the person are here.

You are carrying a sceptre, and wearing a jewelry and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I need my hands free to pray
data.mid_motivation: I pray for my wife who was recently turned into an aardvark
data.long_motivation: I hope the Gods and Goddesses will hear my prayers and send me a witch doctor that can undo the spell
